articles.title: Luke Bryan Says He and Lionel Richie Don't Know if They'll Return for 'American Idol's New Season - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: The country star also shares a few A-list names that have 'been in talks' to join the judges' panel on 'American Idol's new season.
articles.content:
American Idol fans knew that Katy Perry was departing the show after the recent conclusion of season 22 -- but is an even bigger shift coming to the judges' panel?
